name: Super Street Fighter II Turbo HD Remix
summary: Super Street Fighter II Turbo HD Remix is a two dimensional fighting game released using the PlayStation Store and Xbox Live Arcade download services. It is a remake of Super Street Fighter II Turbo (the fifth arcade iteration of the Street Fighter II series) featuring the original game and a high definition version using graphics drawn by UDON Entertainment, and arranged music by OverClocked ReMix, directed by djpretzel and Shael Riley.The game was designed by Backbone Entertainment's David Sirlin to be the sixth definitive version of Street Fighter II,although it is in fact the seventh, being released after Hyper Street Fighter II. A physical copy of the game was later released as part of Capcom Digital Collection.
